org.hswgt.teachingbox.core.rl.learner

Interface Learner

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AgentObserver, Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    EpsilonCalculator, LambdaCalculator, StepSizeCalculator
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ActorCriticLearner, AverageCumulativeRewardBasedEpsilonDecrease, BasicReinforceGaussianLearner, ConstantAlpha, ConstantEpsilon, ConstantLambda, ConstantTabularStateAlpha, DelayedLearner, EpisodicReinforceLearner, EpsilonDecayer, ExponentialEpsilonDecay, GradientDescentExpectedSarsaLearner, GradientDescentLinearAverageStraigthenLearner, GradientDescentQAverageLearner, GradientDescentQLearner, GradientDescentSarsaLearner, GradientDescentSarsaLinearAverageLearner, GradientDescentTdLearner, GradientDescentVLearner, LinearEpsilonDecay, LocalReinforceLearner, OfflineNFQLearner, OnlineNFQLearner, QDecayer, SampleAverageAlpha, SampleAverageEpsilonDecay, SampleAverageStepSize, TabularQLearner, TabularSarsaLearner, TabularTdLearner, ValueIterationLearner, WeightDecay

    public interface Learner
extends AgentObserver
    Interface for all learning algorithms

      • update

        void update(State state,
            Action action,
            State nextState,
            Action nextAction,
            double reward,
            boolean isTerminalState)
        This method will be called in every step of the experiment
        Specified by:
        update in interface AgentObserver
        Parameters:
        state - State at time t
        action - Action at time t
        nextState - State at time t+1
        nextAction - Action at time t
        reward - Reward for doing Action in State
        isTerminalState - True if sn is a terminal state
